title.original: Kithe Ishq Da Rog Na La Baithin
title.english: Do not catch the ailment of Love.

commentary: Sufi prose in ode to Baba Bulleh Shah; on the nature of Love.
'Love' here could be interpreted in a myriad of ways - depending on one's disposition.
I have left Love capitalized since love is anthropomorphized in the original language of the poem.
Some references seem to indicate worldly love - yet others equate Love to God.
footnotes: [1] Reference to Joseph's fate in the Abrahamic traditions.
[2] Female protagonist of the Punjabi love story, 'Heer-Ranjha'.
[3] Female protagonist of the Punjabi love story, 'Sassi-Punhun'.
[4] Male protagonists of the Punjabi love stories, 'Sohni-Mahiwal' and 'Heer-Ranjha' respectively.
lyrics: ishq de rog da kite na daru ishq de rog awalle
There exists no cure for the ailment of Love; Love's affliction is unique.
aklan shaklan wale kite ishq ne kamle challe
Even those of intellect and beauty - Love has left them insane!
ruswayiyaan te khaariyan baajon kujh nahi ishq de palle
Humiliation and intoxication - beyond these, Love has nothing else to offer.
oh barbaad howe kar haafiz ishq ne jehde malle
Left destitute are those houses, says Hafiz, whom Love has visited.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
dil wakhta vich na paa baithin
Do not let your heart fall into craziness.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
yaari ishq de naal main laa baithin
Do not befriend Love...
eh yaar bana ke lut lainda
It makes friends, only to loot them.
eh ishq awalra daku e
This Love is a unique robber...
bas nain mila ke lut lainda
With only its eyes, it can steal everything from you.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
dhandh charkhe pauni bhul jayengi
You will forget to put thread in your spinning wheel.
vich galiya de tu rul jayengi
Out in the streets and paths, you shall be lost.
eh bhaar na kidre ja baithin
Do not take this weight upon yourself.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
jag hai nishaana ishq da ghar ghar fasaana ishq da
The world is in Love's aim; in every house is told the fable of Love.
manzil hai gehri ishq di wakhri kacheri  ishq di
The end goal of Love is unfathomable; Love's justice is separate from this world.
jungle ch dere ishq de arshan te phere ishq de
Love's dwellings are in the forest; Love's wanderings are in the heavens.
mann da na raza matlub di sun da he gal mehboob di
It listens not to the will of the mind; yet it listens to the beloved's voice.
karda kise da pakh nahi kulli da chchad da kakh nahi
It does nothing for anyone; indeed, it even wipes out the poor one's hut.
rakda akal naal vair e kutteyan de chumda pair e
It has old enmities with logic; it kisses the feet of the wretched.
chamda luhaya ishq ne bulla nachaya ishq ne
Love peeled off its own skin; Love caused Bulleh Shah to dance!
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
bhan challi rovein hasengi
You'll become crazy - crying in sadness, and laughing at the same time.
raatan nu uth uth naseigi
You shall be awoken in the nights, and be forced to wander about.
sudh budh na kite gawa baithin
Do not lose your consciousness and good reason!
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
khoohe sataya ishq ne misre wakaya ishq ne
Love throws you into wells - and love sells you as a slave in Egypt. [1]
karda kite zaariyan bakshai kithe sardariyan
Sometimes it blows riches to the wind, other times it bestows wealth.
tuti zulaika ishq ne luti zulaika ishq ne
Love breaks even strong confidence - it robs confidence from you.
kite jit da kite haar da kite dobda kite tarda
Sometimes it wins, sometimes it loses; sometimes it drowns, sometimes it floats.
mu chum lainda dhar da aga ch chala marda
It kisses Fear on the lips and it jumps merrily into fires.
pathar pawaye ishq ne dand vi kadaye ishq ne
Love weighs you down with heavy stones; Love has removed its teeth.
zehran kise layi gholda mu oh vi kujh nahi bolda
For some, it silently mixes poisons - it speaks nothing from its mouth.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
wakhri niyaz e ishq di wakhri namaaz e ishq di
Love has a unique desire; Love has a unique prayer.
sajna nu phirda tolda hafiz e dar dar rolda
It tests friendships, says Hafiz, it makes you waste away at many doors.
ehne heer layi zehran gholiyan ne
For Heer [2], it has mixed strong poisons.
ehne sassiyan sohniyan roliyan ne
It has wasted away many beauties like Sassi [3].
ehda kite wasah na kha baithin
Do not drink what it offers you!
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
duniya ton bachna paina e
You shall have to stay seperate from the world, in exile.
bann kanjri nachna paina
You shall have to dance like an insane harlot!
es ishq to jaan bacha baithin
From this Love, save your life!
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
hanjua nu peena paina e
You shall have to drink your own tears.
mar mar ke jeena paina e
You shall have to repeatedly die, and come to life again.
tu nazar na kite mila baithin
Be wary - don't let your eyes meet!
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love.
ishq de khaab diya nit niklan ultiya e tadbeera
Convoluted are those plans, hatched in the intoxication of Love.
dukha darda waliya pave pairi ishq zanjeera
Made of pain and suffering - these are the chains Love binds you with.
kahi mahiwal te ranjhe isne kite vang fakeera
Innumerable Mahiwals and Ranjhas it has turned into mendicants [4].
lotiya es ishq ne hafiz kayi sassiyan kayi heera
Robbed blind has this Love, says Hafiz, countless Sassis and Heers.
eh ishq de kolon bach kudiye
From this Love, save yourself, innocent girl.
tenu hafiz kehnda sach kudiye
Hafiz speaks the truth to you, innocent girl!
na izzat shaan gawa baithin
Do not lose your self respect, pride, and peace.
kite ishq da rog na laa baithin
Do not catch the ailment of Love!
